    index="semantic-embeddings",
    retriever={
        "rrf": {
            "retrievers": [
                {
                    "standard": {
                        "query": {
                            "match": {
                                "content": "How to avoid muscle soreness while running?"
                            }
                        }
                    }
                },
                {
                    "standard": {
                        "query": {
                            "semantic": {
                                "field": "semantic_text",
                                "query": "How to avoid muscle soreness while running?"
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    },
    highlight={
        "fields": {
